label: ABC4D_oP28_62_c_a_2cd_c-001
title: Monticellite (CaMgSiO$_{4}$) Structure
comments:
This is a quaternary form of \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B4C_oP28_62_ac_2cd_c-001}{forsterite/olivine, $S1_{2}$}. 
 In the sample studied by (Lager, 1978) the (4a) site was actually 93\% magnesium and 7\% iron.  We represent this by magnesium. 
 We use the structural data taken at 25$^{\circ}$C. 
 (Lager, 1978) give the structure in the $Pbnm$ setting of space group \#62.  We used FINDSYM to transform this to the standard $Pnma$ setting.
